name: ModuleCat.isScalarTower_of_algebra_moduleCat
initialProofState:
k : Type u
inst✝² : Field k
A : Type w
inst✝¹ : Ring A
inst✝ : Algebra k A
M : ModuleCat A
⊢ IsScalarTower k A ↑M
decl:
theorem isScalarTower_of_algebra_moduleCat (M : ModuleCat.{v} A) : IsScalarTower k A M :=
  RestrictScalars.isScalarTower k A M
